text: Tyance paigambara tyanna mhanale, he agadi satya ahe ki amhi tumacyasarakhe manava ahota. Parantu sarvasrestha allaha apalya dasampaiki jyacyavara icchito apali krpa karato. Amaci takada nahi ki amhi allahacya hukumavina ekhada mojija (camatkara) tumhala dakhavava ani imana rakhanaryanni kevala allahavaraca bharosa thevala pahije
